en.msg_to_athemm: Hey Athemm! Are you poking around our code again???
en.gen_err_bod: Seems you can‚Äôt access Creators right this moment. Please try again shortly.
en.lan_head_subtit: The only place to get exclusive sneak peeks, tools, and support from Supercell to help you create!
en.lan_inf_tit_1: A place to help you do what you do best
en.lan_inf_bod_1: We truly appreciate the amazing content that you create with Supercell games. We're here to help you become the best creator you can be!
en.lan_inf_bod_2: Become part of a trusted community with exclusive perks, first looks at new game content, awesome tools, and support from Supercell to help you create at your maximum potential.
en.lan_how_subtit: If you have a minimum of 5,000 followers, you can get started by applying to become a Supercell Creator. We‚Äôll review your application and place you in a suitable Creator tier based on how many followers you have on your biggest channel. Once you‚Äôve been accepted to the program, you‚Äôll start getting special access, perks, and support from Supercell to help you create on a whole new level!\n
en.lan_how_foll: How many followers do you have?
en.lan_tier_1_desc: Get invited to the official Supercell Creators Discord server and receive exclusive tools and support!
en.lan_tier_2_desc: Get exclusive content, early access, and first looks at updates and join our Discord server for tools and support.
en.lan_tier_3_desc: Get invited to our Slack for even more exclusive content, access dev builds to preview game updates, and receive in-game promotions.
en.lan_tier_4_desc: Get the highest level of access, support, and trust from Supercell to help you keep creating like the Star you are.
en.lan_tier_5_desc: Become a part of the community by helping Supercell Creators stay updated and enabled to create the best content.
en.lan_how_disc: *Joining Supercell Creators does not guarantee any potential perks. We will provide our Creators with the best perks and support possible, but this will be decided by Supercell on an on-going basis and may change over time.
en.lan_cta_tit: Apply to become a Supercell Creator
en.lan_cta_bod: Ready to get exclusive tools, content, and support to help you create? Get started by applying now!\nYou'll need a Supercell ID to begin your application. If you don't have a Supercell ID, you can simply create one in any Supercell game.
en.home_info_title: The only place to get [exclusive sneak peeks], [tools], and [support] from Supercell [to help you create!]
en.home_info_title_1: A place to help you do what you do best
en.home_info_body_1: We truly appreciate the amazing content that you create with Supercell games. We're here to help you become the best creator you can be!
en.home_info_body_2: Become part of a trusted community with exclusive perks, first looks at new game content, awesome tools, and support from Supercell to help you create at your maximum potential.
en.home_feat_1_body: Get access to the Creators Discord channel and join a community of Creators from all over the world. Receive exclusive content from Supercell. Share tips, knowledge, and make some new friends.
en.home_feat_2_body: Every now and then we give away some pretty cool Supercell merch. Sometimes it‚Äôs for you, and sometimes it‚Äôs for you to delight your favourite followers.
en.home_feat_3_body: Let‚Äôs face it! Being first is A and O. With update previews you‚Äôll be able to create your content and be able to press publish as soon as new features are launched.
en.home_feat_4_body: We‚Äôve added a ‚ÄòVideo Inbox‚Äô to our games, where players can watch video content directly in the game. Upload your best videos or start a livestream and reach millions of viewers.
en.home_feat_5_body: Earn money whenever your followers purchase Gems or Diamonds and reference you.
en.home_stats_title: Today, creators from [NATIONS] nations are being supported by our amazing community managers in [LANGUAGES] different languages.
en.home_super_body: SuperCreators have a solid track record of quality content, a postitive attitude, and trust from our community managers. But hey, becoming a black belt takes years of improvement. And even so, not everyone will make it to this level.
en.home_super_instructions: Tap a creator to hear their stories
en.home_cta_body: In order to be accepted into the program you need to meet the following requirements. But note that they are not a guarantee for getting accepted.
en.home_cta_check_1: Always act in a good manner and respect other Creators and Community Managers.
en.home_cta_check_3: Have a minimum of 5 000 followers on Youtube, or 3 000 on Twitch.
en.not_app_none_bod: We can‚Äôt seem to find a Creators account connected to this Supercell ID. You will need to apply to join the Creators program.
en.not_app_rev_bod: Thanks for applying! We've received your application and will get back to you as soon as possible!
en.not_app_rej_bod: It looks like you‚Äôre logging in from an ID that has previously been rejected. You can send in a new application in [DAYS] days.
en.not_app_ban_bod: Sorry, this Supercell ID has been banned from the platform. If you'd like to learn more on bans or report an error, feel free to contact us.
en.not_app_alreg_bod: This Supercell ID is already registered. Log in below to access your Creators account.
en.not_app_maintenance_bod: Hi there! We‚Äôre doing some maintenance to improve your experience of Creators. The portal will be up and running shortly. Thanks for your patience!
en.ab_bod:
We truly appreciate the amazing content that you create with Supercell games. To celebrate this, we‚Äôve launched Supercell Creators, a platform and program built to offer you - our community of amazing creators - exclusive perks, first looks at new game content, awesome tools, and support to help you create at your maximum potential.

To do this, we‚Äôre using OAuth permissions for different platforms to:

A. Verify your that you are the owner of your channel/account
B. Pull basic stats about views, number of videos and number of subscribers to help guide us when placing you into a suitable tier

If you have a minimum of 5,000 followers, you can get started by applying to become a Supercell Creator. We‚Äôll review your application and place you in a suitable Creator tier based on how many followers you have on your biggest channel. Once you‚Äôve been accepted to the program, you‚Äôll start getting special access, perks, and support from Supercell to help you create on a whole new level!
en.reg_scid_bod: Applying to become a Supercell Creator is super easy! Let's get started by logging in with your Supercell ID.\n\nIf you don't have a Supercell ID, you can create one in any Supercell game.
en.reg_scid_bod_2: It looks like you're already signed in with a Supercell ID. That‚Äôs great! Please click next to continue filling out your application to Supercell Creators.
en.reg_re_bod: It looks like you‚Äôve already started an application. Do you wish to continue or start a new one?
en.reg_pla_bod: Connect the platform where you have the most followers so we can place you in the best tier! You must have at least 5,000 followers on YouTube or 3,000 followers on Twitch to be eligible for the program.
en.reg_pla_other: I create other types of content
en.reg_pla_why_btn: Why do I have to do this?
en.reg_pla_why_bod: To prevent anyone else from signing up with your channel, we ask you to connect with the platform to verify that the channel is yours. This is only for verification purposes, so your information is safe with us.
en.reg_pla_other_bod: Cool! We'd love to know more about what you create! Whether it's managing a subreddit, creating tools, or making something totally different, please enter a URL so we can check out what you do:
en.reg_acc_tit: Which games do you create for?
en.reg_acc_bod: Select the games that you actively create content for so we can give you the best support possible.
en.reg_acc_prim_info: Since you are creating content for multiple games, please also specify which you consider to be your primary game.
en.reg_acc_bod2: Just a few personal details to finish your application! This is only for registration purposes and will never be shared anywhere or with anyone else
en.reg_acc_add_info: For information regarding your Creators account. Will not affect your SCID.
en.reg_acc_nda_body: Before you start creating, you must accept the [[Creators Terms, creators-terms, _blank]] and read through Supercell‚Äôs [[Privacy Policy, https://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy, _blank]]. Below is a summary (but not a substitute for) the Terms for your convenience.
en.reg_acc_nda_1: [[Creators Terms, creators-terms, _blank]] - You are at least 13 years old and understand that Supercell reserves all rights in connection with the Service and its games. You grant Supercell the right to use your User Content.\n
en.reg_acc_nda_2: [[Privacy Policy, https://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy, _blank]] - Supercell collects data to make the Service more functional and suitable for players, show personalized advertisements, and keep the Service fair and safe. We value and protect your data and use it only in the ways listed.
en.reg_acc_nda_3: [[Non-Disclosure Agreement, https://supr.cl/NDA, _blank]] - You agree to keep all Confidential Information strictly confidential and not disclose it to any third party nor use it for any other purpose than in accordance with Supercell's instructions.
en.reg_acc_un_err_2: Creator name can not include < or > characters
en.reg_acc_dab_err: Your date of birth should be in YYYY-MM-DD format
en.reg_acc_dab_err_2: You need to be at least 13 years old to apply for the Creators program
en.reg_acc_nda_err: You need to confirm the NDA
en.reg_acc_term_err: You need to confirm the Terms of Service
en.reg_acc_priv_err: You need to confirm the Privacy Policy
en.reg_acc_gen_not: *We will not use your gender information, it is for Finnish Tax Administration purpose only.
en.reg_acc_sign_err: Your signature needs to match with your first and last name
en.reg_acc_general_err: Something went wrong. Please try again.
en.reg_comp_bod: We've received your application and we'll get back to you soon!
en.wel_bod: Congrats on becoming a Supercell Creator! We can‚Äôt wait to help you grow and create more awesome content for your fans!
en.wel_bod_boost: Hi [USERNAME]!\n\nYour application for Creator Boost has been approved. Now, please read through and accept our Creator code of conduct below and then we‚Äôll set up your Boost details.
en.wel_vid_tit: What you‚Äôll get as a Creator
en.wel_vid_bod: A short message from us about what you can expect from being in the Creator program.
en.wel_coc_bod: As a Creator, you must follow these rules to remain within the Creator program.
en.wel_coc_stop1_bod: Your content must be family-friendly. This means your content should not contain anything relating to drugs, alcohol, explicit images, foul language, or disrespectful behavior.
en.wel_coc_stop2_bod: Don‚Äôt mislead with your content. Titles, thumbnails, and descriptions should be an accurate representation of the content.
en.wel_coc_stop3_bod: You should be kind, considerate, and civil.
en.wel_coc_stop4_bod: This means following Supercell‚Äôs [[Fair Play Policy, https://supercell.com/en/safe-and-fair-play/, _blank]], and never promote hacking, fraudulent gems/diamonds, account sharing or any other violations of Supercell‚Äôs terms of service.
en.wel_coc_stop5_bod: Your content must not violate the non-disclosure agreement, follow the [[Terms of Service, https://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/, _blank]] as well as the terms of service of the platform on which you post it.
en.wel_coc_stop6_bod: Unnaceptable behaviour may result in immediate expulsion from the Creator Program without warning.
en.wel_rule_bod: Everything within the Creator Program is private. We want to have an open atmosphere where we can share early information with all of you, and where you can share tips and learnings with your fellow Creators. In order to maintain this open atmosphere, we will rely on everything in the program to be kept private.
en.wel_start_bod_boost: Now let‚Äôs get your Boost details in place.
en.port_start_bod: Congrats on becoming a Supercell Creator! We can‚Äôt wait to help you grow and create more awesome content for your fans!
en.port_wel_bod: This is just the beginning! Here's a roadmap of what's in store for the program:
en.port_wel_vip_bod: For the initial launch, we're inviting VIP Creators who we already know and support to get early access to the platform and its perks.
en.port_wel_pub_bod: After developing how to best support Supercell Creators in the VIP launch, we'll open up the program and allow anyone to apply to become a Creator.
en.port_wel_fut_bod: We want to support our Supercell Creators and help them grow, so we're looking for your feedback on how to develop this platform best!
en.port_wel_what_bod: Get started now by joining one of our official Supercell Creators channels!
en.port_start_disc_bod: Our Discord server is where all Supercell Creators can hang out, chat, and get updates and support. Everyone's there so it's quite a busy place! Join the party!
en.port_start_slack_bod: Our Slack is where we share first looks at new game content and other special perks with Creators in the Shields tier. Join our Slack for early access and the best support!
en.port_start_ha_bod: App Center is where we share dev builds with Creators in the Shields tier to get early access to game updates. Connect with App Center to play game updates before anyone else!
en.vid_inbox_bod: to our games, where players can watch video content directly in the game. Submit a YouTube video now that you want to show up in the game!
en.vid_inbox_bod_alt: We‚Äôve added a ‚ÄúVideo Inbox‚Äù to our games, where players can watch video content directly in the game.
en.vid_inbox_bod_2: Each game has its own limits for the number of videos you are allowed to upload each week. If your quota is full you just have to wait until you can generate a link again.
en.vid_inbox_guide_subtit: The video inbox is the single biggest piece of trust we can share with you. This feature is giving you direct access to post your videos into the game reaching millions of players.
en.vid_inbox_guide_bod:
With great power comes great responsibility. We want you to pick your very best videos that are above and beyond the rest.

There should be nothing even remotely close to clickbait, every second of your video should be friendly for all players, and you should review this 10x more than anything else you post. Any videos posted here that break our guidelines will be met with a zero-tolerance policy. That means you will instantly lose access to the Creators program and potentially your entire channel. Use this feature with the greatest caution. 

You should avoid things like box opening videos, meme reviews, or other ‚Äòlight‚Äô content. These videos should be useful/deep guides, strategy videos, esports, showcases of sneak peeks, or in-depth reviews of game features.
en.vid_inbox_foot: *The video inbox is available for your primary game
en.vid_inbox_foot_2: You've been granted access for multiple games
en.vid_inbox_foot_3: Your primary game has no video inbox yet
en.vid_inbox_tip: Video inbox is available for your primary game. However, we like your stuff so much we gave you some extra access. üòä
en.vid_inbox_link_used: This link has been opened. Generate a new one by clicking the button above.
en.vid_inbox_subbod: Select a game to submit a video for
en.vid_inbox_link_bod: The link below will take you to the Video Inbox submission page. It is valid for 15 minutes and cannot be reused.
en.vid_inbox_note: *Note: Supercell Creators can generate 100 links per week. You have now created {linksCreated}, thus only have {linksLeft} left this week (that ends on {endDate}).
en.vid_inbox_unsupported: Your primary game [GAME] does not have a video inbox yet
en.vid_inbox_find_tooltip: You do have acess to [GAMES] as well, but [PLURAL] not supported by Video inbox just yet.
en.port_disc_bod: [[Discord, https://discord.com, _blank]] is the open place where all Creators hang out. Everyone is there so it‚Äôs quite a busy place! We‚Äôd love to see you there too, so go check it out now!\n\nFollow the steps below to join. If you‚Äôre already in Discord go straight to step 2.
en.port_disc_con_bod: Discord is the open place where all Creators hang out. Everyone is there so it‚Äôs quite a busy place!\n\nYou are connected to discord! üíö
en.port_disc_con_subbod: Here you can disconnect your Discord account. You will be able to re-connect once disconnected.
en.pot_disc_step_1_body: Go to [[https://discord.com/register, https://discord.com/register, _blank]] and create an account if you don‚Äôt already have one.
en.pot_disc_step_2b_body: - In the popup you need to allow Supercell to get access.
en.port_disc_con_tr: Now you just have to introduce yourself in the [[#General channel, https://discord.com/channels/547793312229097478/547850422140796963, _blank]] in order to flip your Creator progress Discord card.
en.port_disc_banned_bod: You have been banned from Discord üíÄ
en.port_disc_auth_bod: It seems your account is not connected to the Creators Discord channel. You will need to verify your account using the button below. This is so that we can make sure that only Creators has access.
en.port_disc_auth_bod_2: Your Discord account has been verified. We hope the channel is of good use on your Creator journey :)
en.port_disc_auth_bod_3: Your Discord account has already been connected. Thanks for checking. üíö
en.port_slack_bod: Join the Creators discussions on Slack. Get the latest news and game updates from your CMs and connect with fellow Tier 3 Creators.
en.port_slack_bod_2: Enter the email you want to use for Creators Slack. An invite will be sent to this email.
en.port_slack_checkbox: This is the email address I want to use for Creators Slack, and I understand I can NOT change this.
en.port_slack_invite_bod: Please check your inbox and click the link in the email to set up your Creators Slack.
en.port_slack_error_email: This doesn't look like a valid email
en.port_slack_error_confirm_email: Please enter the same email twice
en.port_slack_info: Joining our Slack is super easy! We'll send you an invite link as soon as you've been approved for the Shields tier.
en.port_slack_step_one: 1. Log in to Slack with the same email as your Supercell Creators account
en.port_slack_faq_bod_1: If you didn‚Äôt get an invite by email you can join here: [[slack.com/signin, https://slack.com/signin, _blank]]
en.port_slack_faq_bod_2: Slack is a messaging tool that we use for communication with, and between our Tier 3 Creators. If you are new to Slack, go to [[www.slack.com, https://slack.com/, _blank]] to download and register the software. They also have a great onboarding section ([[https://slack.com/help/categories/360000049043, https://slack.com/help/categories/360000049043, _blank]]) with all the information you might need.
en.port_slack_faq_tit_3: What to expect from the Creators Slack
en.port_slack_faq_bod_3: Slack is where our CM‚Äôs communicate news, updates and releases within the Creator program. It is also where you can communicate other tier 3 Creators to get the most out of the Creators program.
en.port_slack_faq_tit_4: Creators Discord vs. Slack. What‚Äôs the difference?
en.port_slack_faq_bod_4: Discord is for tiers 1 and 2. Slack is for Tier 3 only. You are welcome to join both, but official communications to Creators in your Tier happen on Slack.
en.port_slack_faq_bod_5: Remember that everything written in Slack is strictly confidential until it‚Äôs clearly expressed that you can share information. Violating this may result in expulsion from the Creator program.
en.port_slack_faq_tit_6: I have lost access to Slack
en.port_slack_faq_bod_6: Lost your password? Please refer to this article for help on how to restore it: [[https://slack.com/help/articles/201909068-Reset-your-password, https://slack.com/help/articles/201909068-Reset-your-password, _blank]]
en.port_slack_faq_bod_7: If you need any help or support regarding Slack, please look at their help section. [[https://slack.com/help, https://slack.com/help, _blank]]
en.port_slack_err_bod_1: Seems something went wrong. Please try once more.
en.port_slack_err_bod_2: It seems that the email you entered is already added to our Slack. Please reach out to your CM for support with this.
en.port_ha_tit: How to connect to App Center
en.port_ha_bod: App Center is where we share dev builds with Creators in the Shields tier to get early access to game updates. Connect with App Center to play game updates before anyone else!
en.port_ha_info: Connecting with App Center is super easy! Just follow these easy steps:
en.port_ha_disabled: Your Creators account is currently not eligible for App Center.
en.port_ha_step_one_body: Go to [[https://appcenter.ms/create-account, https://appcenter.ms/create-account, _blank]] and create an account. Take a note of the email address used in the account, you will need it soon.\n\nIf you already have an App Center account, continue to step 2 but make sure you know the email address used.
en.port_ha_step_two_body: Great, now check your email inbox to complete the setup. Didn‚Äôt get the invite? Check your spam box or resend the invite.
en.port_ha_connected_tit: Connected email address to App Center
en.port_ha_connect_success_txt: Great, now check your email inbox to complete the setup. Didn‚Äôt get the invite? Check your spam box or <a href=\
en.port_ha_connect_error_default_txt: Something went wrong. Please try again.
en.port_ha_connect_input_tip: Make sure to use the same email that you use on App Center.
en.port_ha_games_tit: Get access to even more games
en.port_ha_games_txt_pending: Once you have connected to App Center, you will automatically get access to your primary game. Have you already accepted the invite? <a href=\
>Refresh this page to activate more games.
en.port_ha_games_txt_active: You automatically get access to your primary game. But you can also even access more Supercell games by activating them below:
en.port_ha_notice_txt: Note: Hay Day and Hay Day Pop are not currently available on App Center
en.port_user_plat_bod: Make sure you max your Creator status by connecting to your platforms. You need to connect at least one primary Youtube or Twitch channel. But feel free to add more below if you create in other places as well.
en.port_user_plat_mod_bod: Do you really want to disconnect your channel?
en.port_user_plat_addit_bod: Are you active on other platforms? Perhaps you have more than one channel on the same platform? Then specify them below!
en.port_user_plat_addit_mod_bod: Here is a list of supported platforms and channels you can add.
en.port_user_plat_addit_err_unsupported: Oh no, we don't support this platform!
en.port_user_plat_addit_err_duplicate: Looks like you've already added this one
en.port_user_plat_addit_err_invalid: This doesn't look like a valid channel URL
en.port_user_gam_bod: Select the games you create content for
en.port_user_gam_cooldown: You can change or deactivate your primary game on
en.port_user_gam_mod_bod: You may only change your primary game once every 7 days.
en.port_user_gam_mod_info: You can not deselect your primary game. Please change your primary game first and try again.
en.port_user_gam_mod_info_alt: Primary game can only be changed every 2 weeks. You can change again on
en.port_user_aff_info: Stay tuned for Boost stats, coming 2020
en.port_user_aff_disc_bod: If you disconnect paypal, you will not receive payouts from the Creator Boost until you connect again (with same or another account).
en.port_user_aff_paypal_bod: You have disconnected from Paypal. The revenue sharing is therefore turned off until you connect again.
en.port_tie_upg_mod_tit: Would you like to request a tier upgrade?
en.port_tie_upg_mod_bod: If your fanbase has grown since you became a Supercell Creator and you're no longer in the correct tier, let us know and we can see whether you should be upgraded to a higher tier!
en.port_tie_upg_not_bod: Thanks for reaching out. We'll review your current stats and get back to you soon!
en.tier_upg_mod_body: So our content managers have had a look at your account. And yes! We liked what we saw so much, that we decided to move you up to tier 2.\n\nWelcome to the Swords, hope this will help you in producing even more awesome content.
en.port_use_set_abo_em_info: For information regarding your Creators account. Will not affect your SCID.
en.port_use_set_soc_bod: Let us know your social media accounts so we can place you in the best Creator tier.
en.port_use_set_un_err_2: Creator name can not include < or > characters
en.port_use_set_facebook_err: Enter a valid Facebook profile url
en.port_use_set_dab_err: Your date of birth should be in YYYY-MM-DD format
en.port_use_set_gen_not: *We will not use your gender information, it is for Finnish Tax Administration purpose only.
en.port_use_set_del_bod: If you are no longer an active Creator and wish to delete your account, please reach out to your CM for support with this.
en.port_del_acc_bod: You can delete your account anytime, but then you will lose access to all of your Supercell Creator perks, first looks, and support. But we‚Äôd really love for you to stick around and we‚Äôd be happy to hear anything we can do to improve the program.
en.aff_signup_desc: If you join Creator Boost, you can earn money whenever your followers purchase Gems or Diamonds and enter your Creator Code.
en.aff_signup_handle_taken_err: This Creator Code is already taken
en.aff_signup_handle_no_input_err: Your Creator Code must not be empty
en.aff_signup_handle_short_input_err: Your Creator Code must be at least 3 characters
en.aff_signup_handle_char_input_err: Your Creator Code can only include \
en.aff_signup_handle_desc: Your Creator Code is what your followers enter in the game's shop.
en.aff_signup_handle_tip: Tip: make your Creator Code easy to spell and remember. And choose it carefuly - you cannot change it later!
en.aff_signup_pers_det_birthdate_err: Your date of birth should be in YYYY-MM-DD format
en.aff_signup_confirm_txt: Please make sure that all of the information above is correct and then type \
en.aff_signup_confirm_tos: I have read and agreed to the [[Creators Terms, creators-terms, _blank]].
en.aff_pp_err_forbid_bod: Unfortunately Creator Boost is not supported in your region
en.aff_signup_thanks_bod: We've received your application and will get back to you as soon as possible!
en.aff_signup_acc_bod: It looks like you've already joined the Creator Boost program. If you'd like to adjust your details. you can do so on the Settings page.
en.aff_signup_rej_bod: It looks like you've already applied to the Creator Boost program and your application wasn't approved, so unfortunately you can't apply again right now. To find out more or report an error, feel free to contact us!
en.log_body: You need to sign in to access this page. Click the button below to sign in with your Supercell ID.
en.log_err_bod: An unexpected error occured. Please try logging in again.
en.pla_err_foll_bod: It looks like you don‚Äôt meet our current requirements for joining Supercell Creators. From what we can see you need a few more followers. Good luck, and hope to see you again someday soon!
en.pla_err_discord_not_in_bod: The account you tried to connect with could not be found in our Discord (perhaps you have multiple Discord accounts?)\n\nPlease log in to [[our channel, https://discord.com/channels/547793312229097478/547850422140796963, _blank]], and then try again.
en.pla_err_discord_not_connected_bod: It seems this account has already been disconnected.
en.pla_err_discord_already_connected_bod: It seems this account has already been connected.
en.pla_err_discord_banned_bod: It seems we‚Äôve already banned your account from Discord.
en.404_bod: Sorry, but the page that you're trying to access does not exist.
en.cb_cta_bod: If you join our Creator Boost program, you can earn money whenever your followers purchase Gems or Diamonds and reference you.
en.cb_cta_review_bod: Your Boost application is in process and is expected to be activated shortly. Feel free to pop some confetti while waiting.
en.cb_cta_reject_bod: Your Boost has been disabled by admin.
en.my_stu_cb_no_chart: This is your Boost panel. Once your fans start using your Creator Code, you will see the earnings here.\n\nShare your Creator Code!
en.my_stu_cb_info_bod: Things might move around a bit in the Boost section as we‚Äôre working on finding the best way to visualise your data.
en.my_stu_cb_wel_body: Your application has been approved! Now it‚Äôs time to start sharing your Creator Code and earn some sweet revenue for all your hard work.
en.my_stu_cb_code_body: Someone used your Creator Code! That‚Äôs worth celebrating! First only comes once. Open up some champagne and keep up the great work!
en.my_stu_cb_inf_body_1: This is your Boost panel where you can keep track of your earnings and payouts.
en.my_stu_cb_inf_body_3: is the miminum amount to qualify for a payout (But don‚Äôt worry, you bring your earnings to next month if you don‚Äôt reach the ‚Ç¨1,000 minimum).
en.my_stu_cb_tip_body: We can‚Äôt guarantee that the Boost data displayed in Supercell Creators are 100% accurate at all times. Therefore these numbers should be seen as an estimate and actual payouts may differ from what is shown on the site.
en.my_stu_cb_view: Click a date to view details
en.my_stu_cb_est_per: Please note that current period is an estimate and payouts may differ slightly from the data shown.
en.my_stu_cb_prel_info: Last 30 days are always preliminary since potential refunds are calculated and edited close to your payout date.
en.my_stu_cb_soon: Your stats are on their way. Very soon!
en.my_stu_cb_closed:
So we found a few wires on the back plugged into the wrong holes!
This does not affect your Boost earnings in any way but we need to sort them out before we can visualize your numbers correctly. 

We‚Äôll be up and running shortly!
en.my_stu_cb_tax: All Boost data displayed includes tax
en.my_stu_cb_pay_mod_bod_1: Once you reach ‚Ç¨1,000 total revenue threshold across games, you are eligible for a payment. Payments are made approximately 60-90 days after the revenue has been earned and the threshold has been reached. If you do not reach the threshold, your earnings will carry on to the next months until it is reached.
en.my_stu_cb_pay_mod_bod_2: This preliminary data is an estimate and does not factor taxes, refunds, etc. You should expect the final data to differ from these preliminary numbers.
en.my_stu_cb_pay_mod_subtit_3: Do you deduct tax on my payouts?
en.my_stu_cb_pay_mod_bod_3: Yes, tax is deducted from your payment based on the country in which you reside.
en.my_stu_cb_msg_bod: Clash mini is now connected to Boost, meaning you will earn revenue when your code is used in-game. However, we are still working on implementing it on the Creators platform. Therefore, note that potential earnings through Clash mini is not displayed in your dashboard just yet.
en.my_stu_pay_msg_body: We are updating to a new payment provider (Tipalti), which means that all of our creators need to go through a one-time setup in which you define your payment details.\n\nThis includes submitting your name, email, adress - as well as payout method and your registered VAT (if applicable). Please complete your Tipalti setup before Aug 30, 2022. After that date, _|you will not receive any more payouts|_ until you‚Äôve migrated over to Tipalti.
en.my_stu_pay_msg_acc_bod_1: Tipalti is a financial software we‚Äôre using to make things on our side a bit more smooth ‚Äònumber-crunching-wise‚Äô. That way we can spend some more time with you, the Creators :) \n\nIf you want to learn more about Tipalti, you can always head over to their website www.tipalti.com
en.my_stu_pay_msg_acc_tit_2: Can I still get paid through PayPal?
en.my_stu_pay_msg_acc_bod_2: YES! Tipalti gives you more options in how to receive your revenue, and Paypal is one of them.
en.cb_pay_no_pay: No payouts have yet been issued.
en.cb_payments_note_b: Desktop is recommended to complete this form since it might not work on some mobile browsers.
en.my_stu_my_too_bod: Connect with your tools to stay updated and get the most out of Supercell Creators. Click on a tool to learn about how to connect.
en.my_stu_mer_cod_bod: Here is where you will find your merch codes. Seems like you haven‚Äôt received any codes just yet, but remain calm. Good things will come.
en.my_stu_mer_cod_bod_alt: Here is where you find your merch codes. An email notification will be sent out whenever new codes are available.
en.my_stu_mer_cod_bod_alt_2: Here is where you find your merch codes. An email notification will be sent out whenever new codes are available. All merch codes are claimed at [[supercellredemption.com, %{URL}, _blank]].
en.my_stu_mer_cod_share_text: You received [TITLE]. Claim at [URL] using code: [CODE]
en.fee_pos_vid_ph: Your video is being generated. Please check back soon
en.fee_pos_img_ph: Your image is being generated. Please check back soon
en.fee_fil_bod: Specify which games you're interested in getting updates about
en.fee_eve_emp_lbl: Stay strong, Cool stuff is coming!
en.gender_mod_bod: Sorry to interrupt. We‚Äôre continuously working to improve the Creators platform. Therefore, every now and then, we may need to ask you a question or two to make sure we have the data needed to provide you with the best possible support.
en.gender_mod_birthdate_tool_tit: Why do we need this info?
en.gender_mod_birthdate_tool_bod: Some features in the Creators program has a minimum age requirement.
en.gender_mod_birthdate_err: Your date of birth should be in YYYY-MM-DD format
en.coc_modal_bod: The Code of Conduct contains the most important rules in the Creator Program. These rules should be read with extreme care and always abided. Breaking the Code of Conduct will result in expulsion from the Creator Program.
en.nda_subtit: By agreeing to this confidentiality undertaking, I understand that I cannot share ANY information obtained in accordance with Supercell's instructions.
en.nda_1_bod: For the purposes of this Confidentiality Undertaking ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù means all information received either directly or indirectly from Supercell Oy (‚ÄúSupercell‚Äù) in connection with the aforementioned Purpose or otherwise, whether marked as confidential or not, after or prior to the signing of this Confidentiality Undertaking, including, without limitation, information relating to business operations, technology, products, know-how, plans and objectives of Supercell or its partners. This Confidentiality Undertaking applies to Confidential Information obtained in written, oral or any other form (electronic files, visual perception), including documents in different forms as well as copies and excerpts thereof.
en.nda_2_bod:
I shall keep Confidential Information strictly confidential and not disclose such information to any third party. I further agree not to make, issue, or release any public announcement, statement, or acknowledgement of the existence of this Confidentiality Undertaking, except as may be required by law. I shall not use the Confidential Information for any other purpose than for Purpose and in accordance with Supercell‚Äôs instructions. I shall copy Confidential Information only to the extent necessary for the Purpose. This Confidentiality Undertaking shall have no effect to the possible non-disclosure agreement entered into by and between the company I represent and Supercell.

Obligations pursuant to this Confidentiality Undertaking shall not apply to information that I can evidence to have been: (i) public at the time of its disclosure or which subsequently becomes public as a result of publication or otherwise without my act or omission; (ii) lawfully obtained by me prior to or after its disclosure from a third party who has not received it directly or indirectly from Supercell.

Neither this Confidentiality Undertaking nor the disclosure or receipt of Confidential Information shall grant me any license under any patent, trademark, copyright, or other proprietary or intellectual property right pertaining to Confidential Information. All Confidential Information is disclosed ‚Äúas is‚Äù and ‚Äúas available‚Äù without any express or implied warranties.

I shall immediately cease using and return the Confidential Information and return or, if so requested by Supercell, l destroy any copies and documents containing Confidential Information when I no longer need the Confidential Information in question for the Purpose or upon Supercell‚Äôs first request, whichever earlier.
en.nda_3_bod: The obligation of this Confidentiality Undertaking shall remain in force for three (3) years from the disclosure of the said information.
en.nda_4_tit: Applicable Law and Place of Jurisdiction
en.nda_4_bod: This Confidentiality Undertaking shall be governed by the laws of Finland. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with this Confidentiality Undertaking shall be settled by the court of Helsinki. However, Supercell shall have the right to apply for and enforce preliminary procedural remedies at any court of competent jurisdiction.\n\nI have read and understood this Confidentiality Undertaking and agree to be bound by the obligations detailed in this Confidentiality Undertaking until such time as Confidential Information becomes public knowledge through no fault on my part.
en.tr_cards_to_complete: no cards to flip | {cardsCount} card to flip | {cardsCount} cards to flip
en.tr_complete: Your progress is up to date
en.tr_trophy_card_tier1WelcomeVideo_body: A message from us about what you can expect from the Creator program.
en.tr_trophy_card_codeOfConduct_body: These are the rules and behaviour expected of you as a creator.
en.tr_trophy_card_setYourFilter_body: Filter the feed to get information about the games you create for.
en.tr_trophy_card_readAPost_body: Easy one ;) Read a post and watch out for any dates attached.
en.tr_trophy_card_sayHiOnDiscord_body: Introduce yourself and maybe you‚Äôll make a new friend or two.
en.tr_trophy_card_claimAMerchCode_body: Maybe you‚Äôve got some merch waiting.
en.tr_trophy_card_tier2WelcomeVideo_body: Welcome to Tier 2. There‚Äôs a lot of new perks waiting for you. Check them out!
en.tr_trophy_card_updatePreviews_body: Nice! You‚Äôve unlocked the update previews.
en.tr_trophy_card_tier3WelcomeVideo_body: Welcome to Tier 3. There‚Äôs a lot of new perks waiting for you. Check them out!
en.tr_trophy_card_creatorBoost_body: Set up your Creator code and start earning some revenue for all your hard work.
en.tr_trophy_card_sayHiOnSlack_body: Join the discussions on Slack. Make sure to introduce yourself :)
en.tr_trophy_card_appCenter_body: Dev builds? Yep, you‚Äôve got them. Look here to learn more.
en.tr_trophy_card_videoInbox_body: You can now add your videos straight into the games. That‚Äôs pretty cool.
en.tr_trophy_card_enterRaffle_discord_body: You can now add your videos straight into the games. That‚Äôs pretty cool.
en.tr_trophy_card_enterRaffle_slack_body: You can now add your videos straight into the games. That‚Äôs pretty cool.
en.tr_tier_2_upgrade_card_body: Well done! Now our Community Team will personally review your account to provide feedback and let you know if you‚Äôre eligible for an upgrade. \nPlease provide 1-2 weeks \u2028for review.
en.tr_tier_2_upgrade_card_approved_body: Well hello there! We‚Äôve looked at your account and...
en.tr_tier_2_upgrade_card_rejected_body: Hi! We whink that right now, your current tier suits well. But keep creating, and we‚Äôll talk soon again :)
en.tr_tier_3_upgrade_card_body: Get a personal review from your CM with tips on how to grow as a Creator. Allow 1-2 weeks for your CM to review your account
en.tr_tier_claim_modal_body: This means someone from Supercell will have a look at your Creators account and channel to see if you‚Äôre ready for a tier upgrade. Make sure you‚Äôre content is presented in the best way possible.
